review:
Демоверсия почти не отличается от полноценной игры. Даже многопользовательская игра доступна, но только с ограничениями.
Игра похожа Hearts of Iron, только тут про уничтожение всего живого ядерными боеголовками.
В нынешних событиях к тому же и актуальна.

This game is incredibly fun to play, it is quite addictive, it's a great game to play with friends, if you really think about it it is a bit freaky because it really does show what could happen if there's a nuclear war. But either way, it's a great game and you really should play it. The demo is free and on the demo you can still play with friends join games start games etc.

Such an interesting game. You are just a general in a bunker and watch the destruction of the whole world as your army is just following simple, but scary, orders. I really recommend this game, while it might not look like much but it has a very hard emotional impact and it also teaches us the meaning of a nuclear war. Just a good game overall.
nice
This is good shit

I downloaded the DEFCON Demo from the Steam store and ran it on my computer.  After looking at the demo it looked like a great concept, but I decided not to play it and I closed the program.  When I attempted to turn off Steam, I received a message telling me to first shut down DEFCON Demo, but even though I did not see the game running on my screen, it still showed to be running in my Library list.  I attempted to uninstall it and the uninstall failed.  Each time I restart Steam, it appears in my Library list and shows to be running again.  I can use Task Manager to "end process" on the executable file, but it will not remove from my Library list.  I am very concerned about this  game and have written to Steam help about it and await their response.  Virus and Malware scans show no problem, but a Google search for "DEFCON Demo removal problem" find articles on a suspected virus, but nothing was confirmed.  It may not be a virus, but I no longer trust it and will continue attempting to remove it.

This was a fantastic game back in the day. Any fan of C&C will enjoy it.

It’s definitely time for a remake.

Finalmente encerrei esta pérola! O jogo entrega uma experiência militar tática com um pé na realidade e trás uma proposta ambiciosa ao unir uma narrativa de thriller militar com mecânicas estratégicas bem interessantes. Apesar das cenas live-action parecerem ter saído de um filme B de baixo orçamento e a história não ser algo memorável, o game em sim tem uma jogabilidade que oferece um excelente controle de unidades táticas, onde cada tropa tem uma função clara e, quando bem utilizada, pode virar o rumo da batalha. Há um nível considerável de microgerenciamento que achei bem legal pois você pode, por exemplo, colocar soldados dentro de edifícios para ganhar vantagem tática, transformando aquele café da esquina num mini-bunker improvisado. Ver seus atiradores munidos de javelins eliminando tanques das janelas do segundo andar é gostoso demais.

O sistema de recursos também foge do tradicional “coletar e construir” já que você ganha dinheiro ao capturar inimigos, resgatar civis e controlar pontos estratégicos. Isso incentiva uma abordagem mais agressiva e dinâmica, típica de conflitos urbanos modernos.

Agora, sobre as cenas live-action… kkkkk bom, elas têm um carisma peculiar. A produção varia entre "TV militar dos anos 90" e "edição feita por estagiários". Cara tem algumas cenas que não tem como rir kkk Mas era outros tempos e o importante em sí é o jogo e isso eu garanto que para quem curte estratégia militar e um bom RTS é um prato cheio!

во первых это красиво.
пропорции. анимации юнитов. тактикульность спецназа. драматичное падение авиации. красочные выстрелы танков. даже сейчас поиграет мускулами наравне с современными играми, а многих до сих пор спокойно уделает. особенно на фоне большинства вырвиглазно сверкающих разноцветными молниями мультяшных стилей.

музыка тут не совсем музыка. это что-то уникальное. скорее красивый атмосферный ост, который включается когда это нужно и озвучивает происходящее. по переборам пары нот ты можешь понять, что стоит посмотреть на карту, ведь где-то кто-то попал в засаду или что-то пафосно взорвалось и похоронило кучу бойцов. вместо навязчивых "андер атак-андер атак" ты просто слышишь что начался саундтрек из военной драмы и понимаешь что происходит на карте даже не видя этого.

эта игра просто вызывает эстетический кайф.

*понятное дело, что игра древняя и с мультиплеером просто не будет.

Güzel bir gerçek zamanlı strateji oyunu.

Act of War serisinin ilk oyunu.
Üç oynanabilir fraksiyon olması ve ABD'nin ön planda olması biraz propaganda özelliği taşıması niteliğini barındırıyor.  Serinin diğer oyunları da bu planda düzenlenmiş durumda. Yani genel olarak temelde ABD güçlerinin Kartel ve benzeri yasa dışı oluşumlarla savaşmasını konu ediniyor. 

Oyun oyananabilirliğini halen korusa da daha yeni versiyonlarını eğer tercih yapmak zorunda kalırsanız seçmenizi öneririm. Oynanışı eski tarz gzs modelinde yapıldığından çok büyük ayrıntılı bir oynanış beklemeyin ancak yine de stratejik doyum açısından yeterliliğini koruyan bir oyun. 

Modern askeri birimlerin olması, soğuk savaş sonrası ve ikinci milenyuma yakın bir tarihi konu edinmesinden dolayı çağdaş dönemi konu edinen strateji oyunlarının kısırlığını da düşündüğümüzde değerlendirilebilir oyunlardan. Oynanış esnasında genel olarak fraksiyonlar arasında ve oynanışta bir çeşit dengesizlik olduğunu söyleyebilirim. Gelirinizi ve onun korunması işlemine doğru ayarlama yapmazsanız baştan kaybetmenize neden oluyor. İlerleyiş ivmenizi kaybetmenize, derin ve sonu gelmez bir kısırdöngüye düşmenize neden oluyor. Bu durum act of war serisinin kronik sorunlarından birini oluşturuyor. 

Yine de modern-askeri-gerçek zamanlı strateji oyunlarının kısırlığındaki piyasada hala oynanabilirliğini koruyor.
Great classic C&C like gameplay with techno-espionage-ish twish. Good fun!

Great game! Had a lot of fun with it, however it didn't work on start up for me so to fix it I did this:
Disable Data Execution Prevention (DEP):
Open the System dialog (right-click "This PC" -> Properties).
Click "Advanced system settings".
Go to the "Performance" settings and click "Settings".
Select the "Data Execution Prevention" tab.
Choose "Turn on DEP for all programs and services except those I select".
Click "Add" and navigate to the ACTOFWAR.exe file to exclude it from DEP

after that it worked perfectly.
what cnc general could become
BEST GAME EVER...
This game pulls a lot of inspiration from C&C Generals
Un classique du genre, avec lequel je prends encore plaisir à jouer après toutes ces années.

A pretty fun RTS and while similar to C&C generals it does enough to be different and in some ways better (mainly in terms of campaign gameplay and storytelling).

The campaign is pretty fun and builds up pace nicely with more advanced units being introduced across time so as not to overwhelm with in which way to kill the enemy and every unit does have its place though some are better than others but without any glaring redundancies in the rosters. 

In terms of how it plays as an RTS, its pretty generic and while a bit thin on the building an economy side, the urban combat, terrain acquisition and combat mechanics are done well and are simple enough for anyone to get into and reward tactical play. 

I don't really want to say negative points as I don't think this game really commits any cardinal sins so things that could have been better:

- More context in the story, villain is very one note who gets too many lucky escapes with their infinite supply of back up plans
- Lack of campaign for the antagonist is a missed opportunity however the campaign we have is just long enough for a good experience and ends on a tough challenge without wearing out its welcome
- Economy is pretty flimsy with all factions effectively making bank off taking prisoners of war, the oil is good but since it runs out quickly, everyone goes for a POW economy instead
- Feels like there's a missing fourth faction such as a Middle Eastern faction or Russia to aid the mixed consortium forces.

Eine vergessene Perle der Echtzeit Strategie. Es war vor 20 Jahren schon super, und mit der Datei von mod.de spielt man es sogar in UHD.
Der Titel hält was er verspricht. Dauern wird man von einer Action in die nächste geworfen. Eine Kampagne welche den Namen auch verdient (33 Missionen, mit lauter Zwischenzielen und echte Filmsequenzen!)
Für 2,99€ voll drei Abende Spaß. Und den Skirmish Mode habe ich noch gar nicht getestet.

Klasse!

Сама по себе игра отличная. Но что касаемо геймлея: с ботами слишком легко, против игроков выиграть нереально, т.к. тут игроков мало и играют только задроты, которые в игру играют по 10 лет, разваливая тебя в ноль. Так что можно пару каток против ботов сыграть и насладиться атмосферой, не более, против людей можете не пытаться, задры лютые.

(к тому же игроки тут какие-то странные и им действительно нравится в ноль разносить новичков, как ботов, им даже не нравится если ты ливаешь, понимая что игра проиграна)
